body_html: I think that's a bit too automagical, will regularly guess wrong, and you won't even realize because debugging ML models is almost impossible. We haven't implemented any kind of auto-matching for state dicts on purpose. If you have multiple models, you should know how they are structured, and you should implement the matching yourself.

body: I think that's a bit too automagical, will regularly guess wrong, and you won't even realize because debugging ML models is almost impossible. We haven't implemented any kind of auto-matching for state dicts on purpose. If you have multiple models, you should know how they are structured, and you should implement the matching yourself.
